Experience seamless integration between your FluentStream phone system and Salesforce. Sync call details, recordings, and more while creating leads, opportunities, contacts, and service cloud cases effortlessly.

Key Features:
* Effortless Creation: Generate leads, opportunities, contacts, cases, and objects directly from the intuitive pop-up window.
* Data Synchronization: Sync all phone system data and call recordings with Salesforce automatically.
* Caller Insights: Instantly view lead, opportunity, or contact information in the pop-up when making or receiving calls.
* Voicemail Drop: Save time by leaving voicemails with a single click and logging the attempt directly in Salesforce.
* Auto Logging: Automatically log all call events for accurate record-keeping.
* Task Management: Easily create call tasks and events to stay organized and productive.
* Quick Access: Open the relevant Salesforce profile with just one click from the pop-up.

Benefits:
* Seamless Syncing: Keep all your important data synchronized between 
* FluentStream and Salesforce without any manual effort.
* Instant Caller ID: Know exactly who is calling with real-time profile data pulled from Salesforce.
* Time Efficiency: Speed up your workflow with quick voicemail drops and automated logging.
* Enhanced Service: Efficiently create and update cases in Service Cloud, improving your customer service capabilities.

What Makes Our Integration Different:

Our Salesforce integration stands out by automatically syncing data between your phone system and Salesforce, delivering real-time access to crucial Salesforce data for your agents during calls, ensuring they have all the information they need at their fingertips.

Install Today!

Boost your team's efficiency and productivity. Download and integrate FluentStream with Salesforce today to revolutionize the way you manage calls and customer interactions.
